content: अमरावती [अमर-वत्, र being changed to रा by <ls>P. VI. 3. 119</ls>] {@--1@} Abode of the gods, residence of Indra (said to be above Meru or the sun's orb; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ki. 7. 2</ls>); ससंभ्रमेंद्रद्रुतपातितार्गला निमीलिताक्षीव भियाऽमरावती <ls>K. P. 1.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a modern town in Berar, Amraoti.
